title: I believe the inviting previledges on my account or in general somehow are mixed in flex and solo

embed.description: Greetings, I was wondering the logic behind the solo and flex queues, I'm currently Gold on flex and Diamond on solo, yet it won't let me invite my friends to flex unless they are bronze or unranked, or plat 3-diamond 2. I find extremely weird...

body:
I tried this in another section of the boards, but I believe it could go in here as well, please help me fix this? Thank you.

TLDR: I'm gold in flex, it won't let me invite silver / gold / platinum flex friends, because i'm diamond in solo, but somehow it allows me to invite bronze / unranked / diamond into flex... (but my solo works fine, only high plat - low dia)

replies.body: It's intended that each of these modes have their own invitation and tier restrictions based on how you placed, all per the[ ranked play FAQ](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/204010760-Ranked-Play-FAQ).  Unless the player you're trying to invite is still placing for games or not ranked yet, then something could be up.  Hit us up in a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) so we can take a closer look and help out individually.  We'll get back to you!
